name: Download CSV Files and Store in Database

on:
  schedule:
    # Schedule to run every 15 minutes from Monday to Friday, 9:15 AM to 3:30 PM IST
    - cron: "15,30,45,00 3-9 * * 1-5"   # Adjust for UTC time (3:15 AM to 9:30 AM UTC)
  workflow_dispatch:  # Allow manual trigger

jobs:
  download_and_store:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v2

      # Step 2: Download Nifty50 CSV files from Yahoo Finance
      - name: Download Nifty50 Data (CSV)
        run: |
          python3 scripts/download_nifty50_data.py  # Path to your download_nifty50_data.py script

      # Step 3: Append the downloaded data to the SQLite database
      - name: Store CSV Data in SQLite Database
        run: |
          python3 scripts/store_csv_to_db.py  # Path to your store_csv_to_db.py script
